name: Speedback Football
description:
Think YOU have what it takes to make first-string? Are you Pro-material? Could you be a Hall of Fame running back? Then suit up and hit the gridiron with SPEEDBACK™ FOOTBALL!

From SKYWORKS™, creators of the hit iPhone/iPod touch sports games ARCADE HOOPS BASKETBALL™ and FIELD GOAL FRENZY™ FOOTBALL, comes another addictively classic football game!

In CLASSIC MODE you start with three downs to weave between defenders and reach the end zone as many times as you can. You will earn extra downs every time you score three touchdowns. Use your stiff-arm and spin to avoid tackles. There are speed boost pickups amid defenders. Get them if you dare. Once you run out of downs, it is time to hit the showers. Be careful because the defenders get faster and smarter with each touchdown.

In 2 MINUTE DRILL you will have two minutes to score as many touchdowns as you can. There are speed boost pickups you can get to increase your speed and get bonus points. In this mode you will also have the use of the stiff-arm and spin moves to avoid tackles. You can earn bonus seconds for scoring touchdowns without using your special moves. Be careful though, because the defenders get faster and smarter with each touchdown.

KEY FEATURES:

- CLASSIC MODE – Infinite levels to score as many touchdowns as you can before you run out of downs!
- 2 MINUTE DRILL – You have 2 minutes to score as many touchdowns as you can!
- STATE OF THE ART GRAPHICS
- SOUND AND MUSIC VOLUME CONTROLS
- LOCAL HIGH SCORE BOARDS
- GLOBAL HIGH SCORE BOARDS – Compete against running backs around the world!

For copy below, just refer to World Cup Table Tennis - a #1 game in 90 countries!
